segments.text: Daddy , I love this Happy Farmhouse . It's really fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . But no talking , now . Don't forget that you are on a ladder . Take care !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you are holding it for me . Nothing to worry about . I trust you . Oops , what's that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't touch it with your stick . It's a bumble bees ' hive . Get down the ladder . Be quick .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would happen if they started attacking you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can get killed . No kidding . Remember , never stir up a hive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Why do people come all the way here to pick apples by themselves and take them home ? Isn't it easier for them to buy the apples in the supermarket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's for fun . And also , the apples here are Green Food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , daddy . You can see that people only pick the red ones .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Silly boy . Green Food means the plants grown without using any chemicals , fertilizers , and pesticides .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , then what would happen if there were pests ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard they used ultraviolet lamp to kill pests .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cool ! Well , let's go over there to join mom . I want to tell her all about the special pests-killing method .
segments.speaker: S1
